p: Under the A1B scenario, the three GCMs display similar patterns of precipitation change over the upper Abay basin. All three GCMs showed that changes in precipitation will not only affect the mean total yearly amount of rainfall (changes from +17.7% to +46%) but will also impact the annual rainfall distribution (see Figure 4 for details). All three GCMs point to an increase in mean annual precipitation (varying from +241 mm to +639 mm for the mid-century period, see Table 7 on page 20 for details).
